comment: There’s a reason this won whiskey of the year in 2017. Surprised this was the bottle poured when I ordered it
Tons of heat as expected. A splash of water makes it a whole new drink! Excellent!
One dimensional bourbon that absolutely crushes that dimension. Very booze and oak forward that lingers into a buttery ending.
good, but not a 10. not much different than the small batch, except the high proof burn.  hopefully a bit more flavor will come out in the following weeks now that the bottle is open.
